title: Add Transport Document OCR to Dev_Tools
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Eyes on the cargo
gist.blurb: We taught the robots to read shipping labels. They seem to enjoy the paperwork more than we do.
gist.summary: Added 'Transport Document OCR' to the app showcase, a tool for extracting structured product data from images and PDFs.
gist.impact: Developers and logistics wizards can now automate data entry from transport documents using AI OCR.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy logistics/shipping desk scene. The Robot is the star here because it's a machine vision task. The Robot is scanning a document with a beam of light. Polly is supervising with a clipboard.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute robot mascot scanning a shipping document with a bright lime green (#ecf874) light beam. The bee mascot hovers nearby checking a tiny clipboard. Floating pixel letters rise from the paper. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
